metadata.Title: CVE-2017-1000421 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Gifsicle gifview 1.89 and older is vulnerable to a use-after-free in the read_gif function resulting potential code execution It was discovered that Gifsicle did not properly handle certain input. If a user were tricked into opening a malicious GIF, an attacker could potentially execute arbitrary code.

criterions.comment: gifsicle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
